title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: The Colorado Trail
content:
Photo submitted by Joshua Brown, “Just outside of Leadville, CO, along the Colorado Trail. We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public spaces and parks […]

author: Kristi Benedict
